name: Sea Horse
special_abilities_desc: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.
description: They looked like large sea horses of flamboyant color, with a long body and a curled tail.[1] Giant sea horses were naturally shy creatures[3][1] and try to avoid contact with surface creatures.[3] Giant sea horses defended themselves by headbutting an opponent.[3][4] They could be trained to use their strong tail as a weapon in melee combat.[4] These creatures were a herbivorous species.[3] Giant sea could potentially be found in nearly all but the coldest of oceans.[3] They could often be found in the seas and ocean around the Moonshae Isles.[5] Tritons and giant sea horses had good relationships.[6] They also were sea elves' favored mounts and could be trained in combat.[7][1] Locathah were also known to occasionally capture and train them.[3] Giant sea horses were sometimes found as courtiers or servants in the palace of Kalbari al-Durrat al-Amwaj ibn Jari.[8]
caption: A seahorse is any of 46 species of small marine fish in the genus Hippocampus. Having a head and neck suggestive of a horse, seahorses also feature segmented bony armour, an upright posture and a curled prehensile tail.
